About
About
Dedicated psychologist with a strong focus on leveraging insights to drive impactful market research, consumer insights, and UX research initiatives. As a skilled researcher, I have conducted extensive studies to uncover consumer triggers, barriers, and product-market fit. My expertise lies in utilizing both quantitative and qualitative methodologies to deliver actionable recommendations.

With a deep understanding of human behavior, I excel in analyzing data and providing valuable insights that drive effective marketing strategies and enhance consumer experiences. My background in private practice as a Psychotherapist has honed my ability to empathize and understand complex emotional needs.

I believe that I‚Äôm a person with immense Creativity and Curiosity which makes me think out of the box during Problem Solving. I am passionate about Personal Growth, Mental health and Sustainability.

142,445 followers

There‚Äôs a world of boobs out there - each one unique and special. But even today, most makers of bras don‚Äôt think beyond sizes. Our new campaign ‚ÄúThe Museum of Boobs‚Äù challenges this narrative, urging women to recognize and understand their unique breast profiles as an essential step in achieving their perfect fit.

This initiative is more than a campaign‚Äîit‚Äôs an artful celebration, an experience that brings people together to honor the diversity of breasts and the uniqueness of every body. It embodies a promise of Zivame‚Äôs dedication to pushing boundaries in design to craft intimate wear that seamlessly combines comfort, functionality, and an appreciation for every woman‚Äôs unique shape.

We often get asked: Is xto10x a learning company for founders? A SaaS company? Or a consulting company?

In reality, we‚Äôre all of these‚Äîand yet so much more. Our journey started with a simple but powerful mission: to make scaling easier for startups around the world.

In this video, our founders dive deep into the heart of xto10x:
üéôÔ∏èshares why we started xto10x, drawing from his experience building Flipkart and recognizing the unique challenges that startups face when scaling.
üéôÔ∏èshares what we solve for‚Äîaddressing the pain points that startups encounter as they grow, and guiding them through these challenges.
üéôÔ∏èexplains how we solve these challenges, combining our deep operational experience with innovative solutions.

Watch the video to get the full story!

Master‚Äôs Dissertation: ‚ÄúExploring the Association between Psychological Flexibility, Student Stress & Anxiety among Indian University Students during COVID-19 Crisis‚Äù
Master‚Äôs Dissertation: ‚ÄúExploring the Association between Psychological Flexibility, Student Stress & Anxiety among Indian University Students during COVID-19 Crisis‚Äù
Jan 2021 - May 2021
Jan 2021 - May 2021
Associated with Delhi University
Associated with Delhi University
Found using regression analysis, that the Psychological Flexibility negatively predicted (Œ≤ = -.049, t = -5.76, p < 0.001) anxiety among Indian University Students. Thus, highlighting the importance of Psychological Flexibility as a promising resource in reducing anxiety among Indian University Students during the pandemic, using Acceptance Commitment Therapy
‚Ä¢ Completed the research under supervision of Dr. Ishita Bharadwaj
‚Ä¢ Was in top 25% of the class to be awarded the opportunity to do dissertation project with the University of Delhi, North Campus
‚Ä¢ The Paper has been reviewed & accepted, and is in process of being published.
